name: Nose Housing Removal
description: Remove Nose Housing (DPN239-009) and Nose Housing Nut (DPN239-011) from the tool.

name: Remove Jaw Components
description: Remove Jaw Guide (DPN239-006), Jaws (PRG402-8A), Jaw Pusher (DPN239-144), and Jaw Pusher Spring (DPN901-001) from the tool.

name: Tool Preparation for Corner Head Installation
description: Prepare the tool for the installation of the Corner Head.

name: Draw Bolt Adapter Installation
description: Attach the Draw Bolt Adapter and tighten it securely.

name: Attach Corner Head Adapter
description: Attach the Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191) and tighten it securely.

name: Schraube anziehen (DPN907-003)
description: Ziehen Sie die Schraube (DPN907-003) fest und sichern Sie die Drehbewegung des Zugbolzenadapters.

name: Tighten Corner Head to Draw Bolt Adapter
description: Tighten the corner head onto the draw bolt adapter.

name: Remove Socket Screw and Attach Corner Head
description: Remove the Socket Screw (DPN907-003) and attach the CORNER HEAD to the Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191).

name: Nut des Corner Head an den Corner Head Adapter anziehen
description: Ziehe die Mutter des Corner Heads am Corner Head Adapter fest.

name: Set Clearance Between Corner Head and Adapter
description: Set the distance between the CORNER HEAD and Corner Head Adapter to 8.5mm or less.
